Title: Do your own thing
Designer: Jia Hongdong (贾鸿动)Zhan Jianjun (詹建俊)
Publisher: Xin meishu chubanshe (新美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: A couple on an open air market in the countryside, looking at papercuts to buy for their household. The vendor holds a 'Double Happiness' papercut. The title Do your own thing refers to the new Marriage Law: the couple will make their own choice regarding marriage.This is a print from the third edition (September 1954).
